name: The Universe is dying
description:
This Game is part of the Brackeys Gamejam 2022.1

The music used can be found here: 

Setting of the game:The hope is not real

An unknown force is destroying the universe, the last habitable part of the universe is secured by an Energetic Field Emitter(EFE). Unfortunately death cults are attacking the EFE.

The Goal is it to defend the EFE so it can slow down the destruction of everything.

This can be accomplished by, shooting down enemys and destroying the enemy bases.

Bases will reveal themself once they launch an ship to attack the EFE.

How to play:

W to move forward

A/D to steer

Space to shoot missiles

In the lower half of the screen is an radar, which points in the direction of different points of interests.

Blue- EFE

Yellow-closest star

Black-known enemy base

Red-enemy ship

PS:I ran a bit out of time so a few planned aspects are missing like, upgrades, buying ressources and simple transport quests. There was even an price system planned where prices would skyrocket in a longer run cause of the missing planets and therefore missing ressources and workers.(maybe i will take this ideas up after the jam)

Also for some reason my particle system crashed a few hours before the end of the jam which is the reason why the world looks a bit empty.
